1: <pb/>A Benjamín, ay owan is c'ajol, a ton is bi eb yin txolilal ti': Bela, Asbel, Ahara,
3: Axa eb is c'ajol Bela: a ton Adar, Gera, Abiud,
6: <pb/>Eb is c'ajol Aod a ton Naamán, Ahías c'al Gera, yajaw yayji eb xol eb cajan bay Geba; a eb tu' max ilaytok eb cajay bay Manahat, yuj Gera is mam Usa, c'al Ahiud.
8: A Saharaim, aytoc'al juntzanxa eb is c'ajol max alji yet ayxa ec' bay Moab, yet mayal lajwi pojlen ba yetok eb xal yistzil, a ton xal Husim, c'al xal Baara.
9: Axa eb c'ajol, yetok junxa xal yistzil, a ton xal chi yik Hodes: a ton Jobab, Sibia, Mesa, Malcam,
10: Jeúz, Saquías, c'al Mirma. A ton juntzan is c'ajol tu' tol yajaw yayji xol eb.
11: <pb/>Axa yetok xal yistzil chi yik Husim, ay cawan is c'ajol, a ton Abitob, c'al Elpaal.
12: Axa eb is c'ajol Elpaal: a ton Heber, Misam c'al Semed. A ton Semed ti' max watx'nen aj conob Ono, c'al Lod yetokc'al is yaldeail.
13: A Beería c'al Sema, a ton yajaw yayji xol eb max ec' cajan bay Ajalón, a ton eb max ukten el eb payxatax max cajay ec' bay Gat.
14: Axa eb is c'ajol Bería: a ton Ahío, Sasac, Jeremot, Sebadías, Arad, Ader, Micael, Ispa c'al Joha.
17: <pb/>Axa eb is c'ajol Elpaal: a ton Sebadías, Mesulam, Hizqui, Heber, Ismerai, Jezlías c'al Jobab.
19: Axa eb is c'ajol Simei: a ton Jaquim, Zicri, Zabdi, Elienai, Ziletai, Eliel, Adaías, Beraías c'al Simrat.
22: Axa eb is c'ajol Sasac: a ton Ispán, Heber, Eliel, Abdón, Zicri, Hanán, Hananías, Elam, Anatotías, Ifdaías c'al Peniel.
26: Axa eb is c'ajol Jeroham: a ton Samserai, Seharías, Atalías, Jaresías, Elías c'al Zicri. A juntzan eb maxax binaj ti', ichmamej yayji eb yin eb max cajay bay Jerusalén.
28: Axa juntzanxa eb xin, mimek yikbej eb xol is yinatil eb ichmamej tu'.
29: <pb/>A bay conob Gabaón max cajay Jehiel, a ton is yichmam eb aj Gabaón. A is yistzil cham tu' Maaca yoc is bi.
30: A eb is c'ajol: a ton Abdón babel, cax chi tit Zur, Cis, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
32: c'al Miclot, is mam Simea. A juntzan ti' max cajay c'apax yetok eb yican bay Jerusalén.
33: <pb/>A Ner ti', a' ay is c'ajol Cis, axa Cis a' ay is c'ajol Saúl. Axa eb is c'ajol Saúl, a ton eb ti': Jonatán, Malquisúa, Abinadab c'al Es-baal.
34: A pax c'ajol Jonatán, a ton Meri-baal is mam Micaía.
35: Axa eb is c'ajol Micaía: a ton Pitón, Melec, Tarea c'al Acaz.
36: Axa Acaz tu' a' ay is c'ajol Joada, axa Joada a' ay is c'ajol Alemet, Azmavet c'al Zimri; axa Zimri tu' a' ay is c'ajol Mosa.
37: Axa eb yinatil Mosa yin txolilal: a ton Bina, Rafa, Elasa, c'al Azel.
38: <pb/>Wakwan bey eb is c'ajol Azel: a ton Azricam, Bocru, Ismael, Searías, Obadías c'al Hanán.
39: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Esec is yuẍtak Azel: a ton Ulam nak babel, Jehús yet is cab, c'al Elifelet.
40: A eb is c'ajol Ulam, soldado caw wal jelan eb, yojtak eb chi julwaji. Xiwil is c'ajol, c'al yitxiquin, ay 150 eb yin masanil. Masanil juntzan tu', yinatil c'al Benjamín eb.
